posts.post_content:
Hi, does anyone have a new or used copy of the above book they would sell?
It was PSA sponsored and released as part of a PSA Collectors Club promotion, I believe back in 2010.  There are some copies on ebay, but I thought I would ask forum members.  Thanks.
This board has a Buy/Sell/Trade board you could ask.

[quote name="swarmee" post=1739640]This board has a Buy/Sell/Trade board you could ask.[/QUOTE]

Thanks John...
..moved to the T206 section (here) but could also go in memorabilia too, I guess.
Thanks for relocating for me.  Sorry for not posting in the right forum
